cause.description:
Research and develop a plan to help aid homeless youth throughout CT. In CT there are many family shelter but very few shelters or aid for homeless youth ages 12-17 that are without parental guidance. It is the hope of our organization to bring resources and aid to this population.
1. All youth have a right to shelter,food, and aid
2. All youth have a right to feel safe and be protected
3. All youth have a right be helped even without parental support
cause.mission: Aid in the advancement of homeless youth in CT
cause.name: Homeless Youth in Connecticut
